s0001: Central Palace Heaven's Pole star, its one bright one, Tai Yi constantly resides;
s0002: Beside three stars three dukes, or called son attendants.
s0003: Back curved four stars, last big star chief consort, remaining three stars rear palace attendants.
s0004: Surrounding barrier guard twelve stars, feudal ministers.
s0006: Front row straight Dipper mouth three stars, follow north end Dui, appear not appear, called Yin Virtue, or called Tian Yi.
s0007: Purple Palace left three stars called Heaven Spear, right five stars called Heaven Club, back six stars cross Milky Way reach Camp Room, called Pavilion Way.
s0008: North Dipper seven stars, what is called 'Xuan Ji Yu Heng to align seven governance'.
s0009: Ladle carries Dragon horn, balance presses Southern Dipper, handle pillows Shen head.
s0013: Balance, Yin central states He Ji between.
s0016: Dipper is Emperor carriage, moves at center, overlooks controls four directions.
s0017: Divides yin yang, establishes four seasons, equalizes five phases, shifts measures, determines various records, all tied to Dipper.
s0018: Dipper handle wears barrier six stars called Wen Chang Palace: one called Upper General, two called Vice General, three called Noble Chancellor, four called Si Ming, five called Si Zhong, six called Si Lu.
s0019: In Dipper handle midst, noble person's prison.
s0020: Handle below six stars, two two compared, named Three Neng.
s0021: Three Neng color even, ruler minister harmonious;
s0023: Auxiliary star bright close, auxiliary minister intimate strong;
s0025: Ladle end has two stars: one inner spear, Zhao Yao;
s0027: Has curved circle fifteen stars, belongs ladle, called lowly person's prison.
s0028: Its prison middle star solid then prisoners many, empty then open out.
s0029: Tian Yi, spear, club, spear, shield move shake, horns large, troops arise.
s0030: East Palace Azure Dragon, Fang, Xin.
s0031: Xin is Bright Hall, big star Heaven King, front back stars son attendants.
s0032: Not want straight, straight then Heaven King loses plan.
s0033: Fang is Storehouse, called Heaven Driver.
s0035: Beside has two stars called collar;
s0037: Northeast curved twelve stars called banner.
s0038: Banner middle four stars Heaven Market;
s0039: Middle six stars called Market Tower.
s0042: Fang south numerous stars called Cavalry Official.
s0045: Big horn, Heaven King imperial court.
s0046: Its two sides each have three stars, tripod feet hooked, called She Ti.
s0047: She Ti, straight Dipper ladle pointed, to establish time sections, thus called 'She Ti Ge'.
s0048: Kang is sparse temple, governs illness.
s0049: Its south north two big stars, called South Gate.
